title: Rendering React Lists Introduction
description: Welcome to the React documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to rendering lists.

meta.title: Rendering React Lists
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of rendering lists in React, including the use of JavaScript features like for loops and the array map() function.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, for loop, javascript lab, react, rendering lists, javascript tutor, map
